They play in the Southeast Division of the Eastern Conference of the National Basketball Association( NBA) and are currently coached by Stan Van Gundy . The franchise was founded in 1989 as an expansion franchise and has had such notable NBA stars as Shaquille O'Neal , Anfernee "Penny Hardaway, Grant Hill , and Tracy McGrady throughout its young history.
